name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Percell HARGROVE, Appellant

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C.J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Percell HARGROVE, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
Judgments of sentence affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Robert A. Longo (Court-appointed), Michael J. Perezous (Court-appointed), Lancaster, for appellant.

casebody.head_matter:
452 A.2d 1021
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Percell HARGROVE, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted Oct. 27, 1982.
Decided Dec. 15, 1982.
Robert A. Longo (Court-appointed), Michael J. Perezous (Court-appointed), Lancaster, for appellant.
Edward F. Browne, Jr., Asst. Dist. Atty., for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C.J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
